about_the_game:
Deer Crusade is a journey of exploring, fighting, and solving puzzles to collect the fragments of a gem that will return you home, you can get powers and abilities that will make your way easier but to get them you will have to be very skilled.

Set in a mysterious, dark, and dangerous world; Deer Crusade is a Metroidvania and 2D single-player game, with a puzzle-solving system and challenges for your character's progress.

We have been developing a game where you will have to collect fragments of a magical stone to return to your world but these fragments are not always in the same place, and that each new game you will have to search in different places and discover new corners in each game.
We want the game to be for all types of players, complicated bosses and scenarios with dangerous challenges if you are hardcore and quieter areas, riddles, and puzzles if you are a casual player.
